title: Usotsuki Majo To Haiiro No Niji
alternative_title: 嘘つき魔女と灰色の虹 ; The Lying Witch and the Gray Rainbow ; La Bruja Mentirosa y el Arcoiris Cenizo
status: 嘘つき魔女と灰色の虹 ; The Lying Witch and the Gray Rainbow ; La Bruja Mentirosa y el Arcoiris Cenizo
description:
Description :
        "Everything looks the same in this ashen world. Flowers, birds, rainbows, myself. I wonder what 'color' we are. If I meet a witch, will I be able to see 'colors' too?"This story takes place in a world that has lost its "color". Only "witches" can see them. One day, Luma, a boy who longs for a vibrant world, heads to a forest where witches are said to live. After getting lost, he meets a witch named Ilya, and their encounter changes the fate of their "colorless" world.An adaptation of the light novel of the same name, which was written by Soraru and illustrated by Tsukasa Kiryuu.
